attrGroups.reason: CMU's Calendar is asking for your name in order to personalize your calendar.
attrGroups.privpolicy: CMU's Calendar will not use your name for any other purpose, and will not keep this information after you close the calendar window.

attrs.reason: CMU's Calendar needs your Andrew ID in order to display the correct calendar information. CMU's Calendar cannot function properly if an Andrew ID is not supplied.
attrs.privpolicy: CMU's Calendar will not use your Andrew ID for any other purpose, and will not keep this information after you close the calendar window.

attrs.reason: CMU's Calendar is asking for your credentials to access CMU services. This information is not necessary for CMU's Calendar to function, and CMU does not know whether or how it will be used.
attrs.privpolicy: CMU does not know how long CMU's Calendar will keep this information.

attrs.reason: CMU's Calendar is asking for your CMU affiliation. This information is not necessary for CMU's Calendar to function, and CMU does not know whether or how it will be used.
attrs.privpolicy: CMU does not know how long CMU's Calendar will keep this information.

attrs.reason: CMU's Calendar is asking for your surname in order to personalize your calendar.
attrs.privpolicy: CMU's Calendar will not use your surname for any other purpose, and will not keep this information after you close the calendar window.

attrs.reason: CMU's Calendar is asking for your full name in order to personalize your calendar.
attrs.privpolicy: CMU's Calendar will not use your full name for any other purpose, and will not keep this information after you close the calendar window.
